products.title: Bari Spc Merino - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for creating a sophisticated look, the exquisite bari spc in merino features an elegant shade of cream on a resilient cloth adorned with textured stitching. This graceful blind also offers a valuable solar protective coating which helps to keep the room at a comfortable temperature, whatever the time of year. Present the merino in your master bedroom with a soothing palette of creamy tones and compelling golden hues.

products.title: Bari Spc Merino - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a traditional yet modern window display, opt for the bari spc merino, a contemporary blind with adjustable louvres. This practical feature allows you to move the slats accordingly, filtering the desired amount of light and breeze. And if that wasn't enough, this quality fabric also carries a solar protective coating that repels the suns heat without affecting the fabric. Use the merino in your master bedroom to form a sophisticated colour scheme.
